summary: This is an email from a Special Agent with the Federal Protective Service/U.S. Department of Homeland Security, also serving as an FBI Task Force Officer, requesting to review surveillance footage from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) for specific dates in 2019. The request is related to case 90C-NY-3154599 and seeks footage of the entry screening area and visitation rooms.

persons.context: The author of the email requesting surveillance footage from the MCC for specific dates in 2019. They are a Special Agent with the Federal Protective Service (DHS) and a Task Force Officer with the FBI's New York Field Office, C-19 Violent Crimes Task Force.

persons.context: Mentioned as a colleague who will be handling the surveillance footage request while the primary Special Agent is on leave.

keyFacts: A law enforcement agent requested surveillance footage from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) for seven specific dates in 2019: May 31, June 14, June 21, July 5, July 26, August 7, and August 14.
The request seeks footage of the MCC's entry way screening area and the visitation rooms during visitation hours.
The request is related to case number 90C-NY-3154599.

The requesting agent is a Special Agent with the Federal Protective Service (U.S. Department of Homeland Security) and a Task Force Officer with the FBI New York Field Office, C-19 Violent Crimes Task Force.
The email was sent on August 23, 2019, and the agent notes they will be on leave the following week, with colleagues C2 and C19 handling the request.
